greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: First differences of Ulam's sequence A002858.
comment: No pattern in this sequence has ever been observed, according to Finch.
In the first 49,999,999 terms, 1 occurs four times, 36.9% of the terms are 2, and some terms have not occurred. - _Jud McCranie_, Mar 02 2012

Even though some values seem to get larger as the sequence grows, it appears that the combined frequency of the values 2 and 3 approaches 50%.  This shows up even in the first 10000 terms (combined frequency: 49.9%). - _Enrique Navarrete_, May 08 2017
reference: Steven R. Finch, Mathematical Constants, Cambridge, 2003, pp. 145-151.
link: Jud McCranie, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Steven R. Finch, Stolarsky-Harborth Constant [From the Wayback machine]
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jul 25 2002
